prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

LIGHTING: day time - use appropriate day lighting (bright, natural sunlight)


SCENE:
- Location: The Abandoned Music Room - A dusty, sun-drenched room filled with old instruments covered in white sheets. This is Kai's domain.- Shot: medium shot showing characters from waist up
- Angle: low angle looking up, shows power or grandeur

CHARACTERS (draw with correct human anatomy and proportions):
- Character 'Kai' (messy silver-tinted hair, piercing blue ghostly eyes, unbuttoned school blazer, faint blue glow, slight static effect around hands) - Expression: thoughtful - Position: left of frame

ACTION: Kai sitting on the piano. He looks pristine, unlike the other ghosts. Sunlight passes slightly through his shoulder.

FORMAT:
- FULL BLEED: artwork extends to ALL edges, no white borders
- No speech bubbles or text in the image

QUALITY:
- Clean linework, correct anatomy and body proportions
- Expressive faces, dynamic poses
- Professional webtoon art quality

panel_data.action: Kai sitting on the piano. He looks pristine, unlike the other ghosts. Sunlight passes slightly through his shoulder.
panel_data.continuity_note: Kai is wearing a slightly older style school uniform.
